h1: How Many Calories Are in a Waffle?
assumptions: Standard plain frozen waffle (e.g., Eggo-style), about 70g, toasted without toppings; no butter or syrup added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One standard waffle provides about 210 kcal, with 30 g carbs and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a waffle without toppings?
faqs.a: About 210 kcal for one standard plain waffle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a waffle?
faqs.a: Roughly 30 g carbs, including 2 g fiber and 5 g sugars per waffle.
No, typically 5 g protein per waffle; pair with toppings like nuts for more.

faqs.q: How does waffle size affect calories?
faqs.a: Smaller waffles (~50g) have ~150 kcal; larger Belgian-style ~300 kcal.

faqs.q: What makes waffles higher in calories?
faqs.a: Added butter, syrup, or chocolate chips; plain versions are lower.
